metadata.title: CVE-2024-42310 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/gma500: fix null pointer dereference in cdv_intel_lvds_get_modesIn cdv_intel_lvds_get_modes(), the return value of drm_mode_duplicate()is assigned to mode, which will lead to a NULL pointer dereference onfailure of drm_mode_duplicate(). Add a check to avoid npd.
